casebody.data:
STATE of North Carolina
v.
James ADAMS. No. 23P07. Supreme Court of North Carolina, Twenty-Seven-B District. March 8, 2007. James Adams, Pro Se. Daniel P. O'Brien, Assistant Attorney General, Rick Shaffer, District Attorney, for State of NC.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed by Defendant on the 18th day of January 2007 in this matter for a writ of certiorari to review the order of the North Carolina Court of Appeals, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Dismissed by order of the Court in conference, this the 8th day of March 2007."
